TransCLIME

Transfer learning in high-dimensional graphical models with false discovery rate control.

Installation

The development version can be installed from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Ulthran/TransCLIME")

Documentation

See the GitHub Pages site for function documentation. See vignettes for further usage information. Please cite Transfer Learning in Large-scale Gaussian Graphical Models with False Discovery Rate Control by Sai Li, T. Tony Cai, & Hongzhe Li.
